mapper.select: SELECT M.MILEAGE_SEQ mileageSeq , M.MILEAGE_CATEGORY mileageCategory , M.USER_ID userId , M.CREATE_DATE createDate , M.MILEAGE_STATUS mileageStatus , U.USER_NAME userName FROM TB_MILEAGE M JOIN TB_USER U ON M.USER_ID = U.USER_ID ORDER BY createDate DESC

SELECT M.USER_ID userId , M.MILEAGE_TITLE mileageTitle , M.MILEAGE_CONTENT mileageContent , M.MILEAGE_CATEGORY mileageCategory , M.MILEAGE_IMG mileageImg , M.MILEAGE_STATUS mileageStatus , M.CREATE_DATE createDate , U.USER_NAME userName FROM TB_MILEAGE M JOIN TB_USER U ON M.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE M.MILEAGE_SEQ = #{mileageSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MILEAGE SET MILEAGE_STATUS = #{mileageStatus}, MILEAGE_SCORE = #{mileageScore}, APPROVE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MILEAGE_SEQ = #{mileageSeq}
